trans-unit.source: What is your current living situation?

trans-unit.source: At least once a week, do you privately care for people with age-related conditions, chronic illnesses, or frailty?
trans-unit.target: At least once a week, do you privately care for people with age-related conditions, chronic illnesses, or frailty?

trans-unit.source: This doesn't include care services or support that you provide professionally.
trans-unit.target: This doesn't include care services or support that you provide professionally.

trans-unit.source: Working in the medical field (care, doctor's office, hospital, or similiar)
trans-unit.target: Working in the medical field (care, doctor's office, hospital, or similiar)

trans-unit.source: Cared for or accomodated in the medical sector (care or hospital)
trans-unit.target: Cared for or accomodated in the medical sector (care or hospital)

trans-unit.source: Working in a community facility (school, day care center, university, home etc.)
trans-unit.target: Working in a community facility (school, day care center, university, home etc.)

trans-unit.source: Cared for or accomodated in a community facility (school, day care center, university, home etc.)
trans-unit.target: Cared for or accomodated in a community facility (school, day care center, university, home etc.)

trans-unit.source: No, in none of the above
trans-unit.target: No, in none of the above

trans-unit.source: Do you work or are you cared for/accommodated in one of the following areas?
trans-unit.target: Do you work or are you cared for/accommodated in one of the following areas?

trans-unit.source: Have you had close contact with a confirmed case?
trans-unit.target: Have you had close contact with a confirmed case?

trans-unit.source: Close contact with a confirmed case means: * Face-to-face contact for longer than 15 minutes * Direct, physical contact (touching, shaking hands, kissing) * Being within 1.5 meters of the person for more than 15 minutes * Contact with or exchange of body fluids * Living in the same apartment. Choose "No" if you have worn adequate protective measures (mask, smock) on contact.
trans-unit.target: Close contact with a confirmed case means: * Face-to-face contact for longer than 15 minutes * Direct, physical contact (touching, shaking hands, kissing) * Being within 1.5 meters of the person for more than 15 minutes * Contact with or exchange of body fluids * Living in the same apartment. Choose "No" if you have worn adequate protective measures (mask, smock) on contact.

trans-unit.source: What day was the last contact?
trans-unit.target: What day was the last contact?

trans-unit.source: In the past 24 hours, which of the following symptoms have you had? (multiple selection possible)
trans-unit.target: In the past 24 hours, which of the following symptoms have you had? (multiple selection possible)

trans-unit.source: The question relates to acute or exacerbated symptoms and excludes chronic complaints or seasonal or allergic complaints. If you have a chronic illness, compare your current symptoms with your previous problems to answer the question. If you haven't had any of the symptoms, choose the “Next” button without selecting a symptom.
trans-unit.target: The question relates to acute or exacerbated symptoms and excludes chronic complaints or seasonal or allergic complaints. If you have a chronic illness, compare your current symptoms with your previous problems to answer the question. If you haven't had any of the symptoms, choose the “Next” button without selecting a symptom.

trans-unit.source: If you haven't had any of the symptoms, choose the “Next” button without selecting a symptom.
trans-unit.target: If you haven't had any of the symptoms, choose the “Next” button without selecting a symptom.

trans-unit.source: In the past 24 hours, did you feel that you were more quickly out of breath than usual?
trans-unit.target: In the past 24 hours, did you feel that you were more quickly out of breath than usual?

trans-unit.source: Choose “Yes“ if you have difficulty breathing or shortness of breath: * While sitting or lying down * When getting up from a bed or a chair * After light activity, such as going for a walk or climbing some stairs. If you have chronic lung disease, compare your current breathing problems with your previous breathing problems.
trans-unit.target: Choose “Yes“ if you have difficulty breathing or shortness of breath: * While sitting or lying down * When getting up from a bed or a chair * After light activity, such as going for a walk or climbing some stairs. If you have chronic lung disease, compare your current breathing problems with your previous breathing problems.

trans-unit.source: With regard to all questions about symptoms: since when have you had the symptoms you specified?
trans-unit.target: With regard to all questions about symptoms: since when have you had the symptoms you specified?

trans-unit.source: Has a doctor diagnosed with any of the following illnesses?
trans-unit.target: Has a doctor diagnosed with any of the following illnesses?

trans-unit.source: If you don't have any of the illnesses, choose the “Next” button without selecting a symptom.
trans-unit.target: If you don't have any of the illnesses, choose the “Next” button without selecting a symptom.

trans-unit.source: We use your height and weight to calculate your body mass index (BMI). The BMI can be a risk factor in the context of COVID-19.
trans-unit.target: We use your height and weight to calculate your body mass index (BMI). The BMI can be a risk factor in the context of COVID-19.

trans-unit.source: You take or get immunosuppresives after an organ transplant, in the therapy of an autoimmune disease, or during chemotherapy.
trans-unit.target: You take or get immunosuppresives after an organ transplant, in the therapy of an autoimmune disease, or during chemotherapy.

trans-unit.source: Have you been vaccinated against flu between August 2020 and today?
trans-unit.target: Have you been vaccinated against flu between August 2020 and today?

trans-unit.source: Consent to the transmission of your postal code and recommended action?
trans-unit.target: Consent to the transmission of your postal code and recommended action?

trans-unit.source: You can find more information in the data protection declaration.
trans-unit.target: You can find more information in the data protection declaration.

trans-unit.source: You can enter your postal code here. By specifying your postal code, you allow us to map the data you donated on a map of Germany. This enables us further understand the spread of the pandemic.
trans-unit.target: You can enter your postal code here. By specifying your postal code, you allow us to map the data you donated on a map of Germany. This enables us further understand the spread of the pandemic.
